name: Don't Take The Last Bus
description:
"Don't Take The Last Bus" is a chilling VR game that places you as a passenger on a mysterious bus ride. You quickly realize that the bus is not heading in the right direction, and the only way to get off is to engage with your fellow passengers and fulfill their needs.

As you explore the bus, you must interact with various objects and engage in conversations with the other passengers to learn about their needs and wants. Each passenger presents a unique challenge, and you must use your wit and problem-solving skills to fulfill their requests.

Some passengers may require simple favors, such or finding a lost item, while others may want to play games like tic tac toe, rock paper scissors, or blackjack. You must play these games strategically to win their trust and learn more about their needs.

However, not all passengers are friendly, and some may try to deceive or harm you. You'll need to stay alert and aware of your surroundings to avoid danger and navigate the bus's twists and turns.

Can you solve the mystery of the bus's destination and escape in time? Play "Don't Take The Last Bus" to find out if you have what it takes to get off the bus and survive the ride.

controls:

select - right/left index trigger

interaction - right/left hand Trigger

walk - left stick

turn - right stick

teleport - hold/release right stick 

pause - button a/x
